entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove legacy tagger APIs once TypeScript moves to new API. #57180
  • Can we modify `LocalRewritingValidator` to enforce that `BoundUnconvertedObjectCreation` does not survive past local rewriting? #57179

Closed

  • VS 2022 - Add new class is always internal #57174
    17.0
  • Array Initializer into class property throws null reference exception #57153
  • "is new()" crashes csc.exe #57088
    17.1
  • Hovering over the dot before an invocation shows wrong overload #57031
    17.1
  • In Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Collections, pin S.C.Immutable to 5.0.0 to allow prebuilt reduction downstream #57129
  • Produce Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Collections NuGet package during source-build #57092
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unnecessary Symbol type checks #57181
    Area-Compilers
  • Add docs/compilers/CSharp/Params Span.md #57178
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix generator caching in compiler server #57177
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Binder.CreateConversion - Report use-site diagnostics for the entire conversion hierarchy. #57175
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix DAG crash with removable numerical test following type test #57173
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements (Part 1) #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
  • Ensure low-pri fixes go in the right async lightbulb bucket. #57171
    Area-IDE
  • Disable async lightbulbs #57169
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Add TypeScript External Access API for document highlighting, signature help #57168
    Area-IDE
  • Remove cancellation token from tagging context object. #57167
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Obtain OutputRefFilePath from project system #55244
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57144
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Explicitly report an exception on the host side when nav-to crashes #56682
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix 'T is new()' crash #57091
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57176
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix QuickInfo on dot of member access #57145
    Area-IDE, 17.1.P1
  • Merge 17.0-vs-deps to 17.0 #57156
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Avoid NFE telemetry for normal cancellation scenarios #57151
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove constraint check in interesting scenario for dynamic constraint checking feature #57131
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57166
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57182
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
  • ✨ Implement SegmentedHashSet<T> #54574
    Area-Compilers
  • Check constraints on lifted operator types #57050
    Area-Compilers
  • Draft #57161
    Area-IDE
  • Pass completion options explicitly throughout the implementation of completion providers #57058
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Move skeleton ref caching to ProjectStates #57158
    Area-IDE
  • Document break for negative Length tests #57149
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Test, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Honor suppression on tuple element in switch #57118
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, 17.1
  • Allow newlines in the holes inside interpolated strings #56853
    Area-Compilers, Compiler.Next
  • Apply arcade-powered source-build patches #55823
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Ensure we don't throw when we filter an incomplete list to be empty #57160
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Record status for "newlines in interpolations" #57155
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Fix named mutex workaround for .NET Mono runtime #57003
    Area-Compilers
  • Build more projects during source-build #57165
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [DNM] Testing pool provider changes - Redirect Roslyn PR to Helix Staging #56910
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add Visual Studio 2022 Editor Color Scheme #57138
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Update to the latest debugger contracts #56722
    Area-Interactive
  • Go To Definition from source information in PDBs #57073
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Implement an LspWorkspaceManager and modify how we fork documents in LSP. #57140
    Area-IDE
  • Completion options4 #57139
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Adding some additional tests and asserts #57164
    Area-IDE
